content: make your very own crocheted and knit amigurumi ducks with the help of the step-by-step pattern it s a perfect choice for intermediate crocheters and knitters the body of the duck is crochet and the clothing is knitted you ll also find a full video tutorial linked in the pattern for how to crochet and knit the duck and clothing the pattern pdf download link will be available in your order history to access it please log in to your account on a laptop not a phone and check your order details if you re unable to find the files kindly contact elise rose crochet via direct message providing your email address as well materials and tools required for making the duck detailed information about supplies is in the pattern light worsted weight yarn for duck body sport weight yarn for clothing 3 5 mm crochet hook 3 mm 3 5 mm or 4 mm knitting needles yarn needle black embroidery floss scissors polyfil stuffing stitch markers 6 mm safety eyes another option is to crochet petunia petalmouse in worsted weight yarn using a 3 5 mm and 4 mm crochet hooks basic crochet skills are required the magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet increase decrease and back loop only if you have any questions regarding this crochet pattern or need assistance please feel free to reach out to me through the following channels email elise@eliserosecrochet com website eliserosecrochet com youtube elise rose crochet
